title: GET_PLAYER_FOCUS_POS
content:
0x586F80FF// GetPlayerFocusPos
Vector3 GET_PLAYER_FOCUS_POS(char* playerSrc);Parameters:playerSrc: The player to get the focus position ofReturns: Returns a Vector3 containing the focus position of the player.Gets the focus position (i.e. the position of the active camera in the game world) of a player.
